Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Westbound Reroute near Rossevelt/Cicero
ShortDescription: Westbound 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Cicero, Harrison, Laramie and Roosevelt: due to, police activity near Roosevelt/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Westbound #12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Cicero, Harrison, Laramie, Roosevelt and over regular route: due to, police activity near Roosevelt/Cicero.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
